A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is one of my favourite Star Wars movies! The storytelling and action scenes are suburb. It's a cross between Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Visually\, it's striking\, particularly in the Empire room scene! The chemistry between the actors who play Rey and Kylo Ren is simmering. There are many classic Star Wars tongue in cheek moments to make you laugh out loud and action sequences to keep you on the edge of your seat. It's an upgrade from episode 7!
